function.name: play
function.description: Play cards from hand as a poker hand to score chips.

cards.description: 0-based indices of cards to play (1-5 cards)

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for playing these cards

function.name: discard
function.description: Discard cards from hand to draw new ones.

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for discarding these cards

function.name: rearrange
function.description: Rearrange cards in hand, jokers, or consumables. Provide exactly one of: hand, jokers, or consumables.

hand.description: New order of hand cards (permutation of current indices)

function.name: sell
function.description: Sell a joker or consumable for money. Provide exactly one of: joker or consumable. WARNING: Selling jokers is strongly discouraged in conservative strategy.

function.name: use
function.description: Use a consumable card (Tarot, Planet, or Spectral).

cards.description: 0-based indices of target cards (for consumables that require selection)

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for using this consumable

function.name: buy
function.description: Buy a card, voucher, or pack from the shop. Provide exactly one of: card, voucher, or pack. Ensure purchase does not drop money below $25 after Ante 2.

pack.description: 0-based index of booster pack to buy and open

function.name: reroll
function.description: Reroll the shop items (costs money). Only reroll if you have $30+ to maintain interest threshold.

function.name: next_round
function.description: Leave the shop and advance to blind selection.

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for leaving the shop

function.name: sell
function.description: Sell a joker or consumable for money. Provide exactly one of: joker or consumable. WARNING: Selling jokers is strongly discouraged in conservative strategy.

function.name: use
function.description: Use a consumable card (Tarot, Planet, or Spectral).

cards.description: 0-based indices of target cards (for consumables that require selection)

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for using this consumable

function.name: rearrange
function.description: Rearrange jokers or consumables. Provide exactly one of: jokers or consumables.

function.name: select
function.description: Select the current blind to begin the round. In conservative strategy, always select blinds in Antes 1-3.

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for selecting this blind

function.name: skip
function.description: Skip the current blind (Small or Big only) to receive the tag reward. Only skip in Antes 4+ when you have $25+ and can beat the Boss.

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for skipping this blind

function.name: pack
function.description: Select a card from the opened booster pack, or skip without taking any card. For Arcana/Spectral packs, cards are used immediately and may require targeting hand cards. Avoid risky Spectral cards.

card.description: 0-based index of card to select from pack (omit if skipping)

targets.description: 0-based indices of hand cards to target (required for some Tarot/Spectral cards)

skip.description: Set to true to skip the pack without selecting a card

reasoning.description: Strategic reasoning for this selection or skip

function.name: sell
function.description: Sell a joker to make room when selecting from a Buffoon pack. Only jokers can be sold (not consumables). Only available when a Buffoon pack is open. WARNING: Selling jokers is strongly discouraged in conservative strategy. Only sell to make room for a significantly better joker.
